Uproar smiles to Perceptor.

"Count me in Perceptor.  Whatever you need, I'=
ll do it."

Quickstride also chimes in.

"Same here, that windmill project =
may have ta go on hold.  We better work on how the heck we're gonna keep Hy=
dras out without losing any more comrades..  Heeeey, Perceptor, you're good=
 at designing security systems..  If Uproar and I give you a hand, do you t=
hink you might be able to come up with something to keep the Ark's paramete=
rs safe?"

They look to him enthusiastically.
